doc.field:
This layer contains information on the Regional Park System in the metropolitan area. The principal data sources are: park operating agencies and master plans, 2000 Land Use Inventory (Metropolitan Council) and 2013 county parcel datasets.
Two datasets are included: parks_regional.shp: includes boundaries of parcels where they form subdivisions of parks parks_regional_Dissolve.shp: derived form the other dataset, this layer dissolves the data to have just one polygon per park and fewer attributes.

<?xml version="1.0"?><metadata><idinfo><citation><citeinfo><origin>Metropolitan Council</origin><pubdate>20130828</pubdate><title>Regional Recreation Open Space Features</title><mgmg1cid>N/A</mgmg1cid><pubinfo><publish>Metropolitan Council</publish></pubinfo><onlink>ftp://gisftp.metc.state.mn.us/ParksRegional.zip</onlink></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>This layer contains information on the Regional Park System in the metropolitan area. The principal data sources are: park operating agencies and master plans, 2000 Land Use Inventory (Metropolitan Council) and 2013 county parcel datasets.
Two datasets are included: parks_regional.shp: includes boundaries of parcels where they form subdivisions of parks parks_regional_Dissolve.shp: derived form the other dataset, this layer dissolves the data to have just one polygon per park and fewer attributes.</abstract><purpose>This layer was created to show the Regional Park System for regional analysis and planning.</purpose><supplinf>Twin Cities 7 County Metropolitan Area. This includes the counties of Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott and Washington in Minnesota.</supplinf></descript><timeperd><timeinfo><sngdate><caldate>20130828</caldate></sngdate></timeinfo><current>Data current as of the Time Period of Content Date above. Updated as new/corrected information is made available.</current></timeperd><status><progress>In work</progress><update>As Needed</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc>-94.012</westbc><eastbc>-92.732</eastbc><northbc>45.415</northbc><southbc>44.471</southbc></bounding></spdom><keywords><theme><themekt>None</themekt><themekey>Regional Parks, Parks, Open Space</themekey></theme><place><placekey>Twin Cities, Anoka County, Carver County, Dakota County, Hennepin County, Ramsey County, Scott County, Washington County</placekey></place></keywords><accconst>None</accconst><useconst>None</useconst><browse><browsen>http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/bg/ParksRegional.jpg</browsen><browsed>Sample map showing the ParksRegional layer</browsed></browse><native>ArcGIS 9x</native><crossref><citeinfo><title>Regional Trails - Existing and Proposed http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/TrailsRegional.htm</title></citeinfo></crossref><ptcontac><cntinfo><cntperp><cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg><cntper>Craig Skone</cntper></cntperp><cntpos>Senior GIS Technician</cntpos><cntaddr><addrtype> mailing and physical address </addrtype><address>390 Robert Street North</address><city>St. Paul</city><state>Minnesota</state><postal>55101-1805</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651-602-1328</cntvoice><cntfax>651-602-1674</cntfax><cntemail>craig.skone@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></ptcontac></idinfo><dataqual><logic>The dataset is topologically 'clean'.</logic><complete>Entire seven county geographic area is covered.
Data exclude local and county parks and rec. features.</complete><posacc><horizpa><horizpar>The positional accuracy of the dataset has not been tested under the National Standards for Spatial Data Accuracy. The positional accuracy of the dataset is UNKNOWN</horizpar></horizpa></posacc><lineage><srcinfo><srcscale /></srcinfo><procstep><procdesc>Data Sources: Various: park operating agencies and master plans, 2000 Land Use Inventory (Metropolitan Council) and 2013 county parcel files.
Accuracy: Various: The Regional Parks data evolved over a period of years, beginning with the "Parks and Recreation" land use classification from the 1990 Land Use Inventory. This file was updated using county parcel information as well as data supplied by the operating agencies. Boundaries are updated or corrected as new or better information is made available.</procdesc></procstep></lineage></dataqual><spdoinfo><indspref>None</indspref><direct>Vector</direct><mgmg3obj>polygon shapes</mgmg3obj><mgmg3til>One layer for entire seven county region.</mgmg3til></spdoinfo><spref><vertdef><altsys><altdatum>Not applicable</altdatum><altunits /></altsys><depthsys><depthdn>Not applicable</depthdn><depthdu /></depthsys></vertdef><horizsys><planar><gridsys><gridsysn>Universal Transverse Mercator</gridsysn><utm><utmzone>15</utmzone></utm></gridsys><planci><plandu>meters</plandu></planci></planar><geodetic><horizdn>NAD83</horizdn><ellips>GRS80</ellips></geodetic></horizsys></spref><eainfo><overview><eaover>Attributes for parks_regional:
PARKNAME: Park name, where known
CLASS: Regional
TYPE: Regional = Regional Park, Park Reserve, Special Recreation Feature, Wildlife Management Area State = State-owned land
AGENCY: Name of operating agency
IN_SYS: Y = Yes (considered part of the regional recreation open space system)
AREA_SM: Area in square meters
ACRES: Area in acres
STATUS: Regional park status: Existing (open to the public) or Planned (master plan boundaries exist - not yet open to the public).
CLASTAT: Combination of CLASS and STATUS for regional parks
--------------------------------------------------------------
Attributes for parks_regiona_dissolvedl:
PARKNAME: Park name, where known
FIRST_CLASS: Regional
FIRST_TYPE: The TYPE value of the first record in the dissolve process for the park.
SUM_AREA = Sum of the SQUARE METERS of the polygons included in the dissolve.
SUM_ACRES: Sum of the ACRES of the polygons included in the dissolve.
</eaover><eadetcit>None</eadetcit></overview></eainfo><distinfo><resdesc>ParksRegional</resdesc><distliab>NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13). If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, it is recommended that the GIS Data include a copy of this disclaimer and this metadata.</distliab><stdorder><digform><digtinfo><formname>ArcView Shape file</formname><formvern>ArcGIS 9x</formvern><transize>1.0 Mb for zip file.</transize></digtinfo></digform><ordering>This dataset is distributed on the internet by clicking below after 'Online Linkage'. Doing so will tell your browser to download a 'ZIP' file which will contain the following:
- ArcView shape files - metadata for the dataset (.htm) - NOTICE.RTF, an important notice about this dataset that can be read by any word processing software.
Additionally, this dataset is available for direct use via one or more map services. More information about what a web mapping service is can be found at http://www.datafinder.org/services/. The specific map service and layer name for this dataset can be found by clicking the blue or green boxes under the map service column of the DataFinder Catalog at http://www.datafinder.org/catalog/ .</ordering></stdorder><distrib><cntinfo><cntperp><cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg><cntper>Jon Hoekenga</cntper></cntperp><cntpos>GIS System Administrator</cntpos><cntaddr><address>390 Robert Street North</address><city>St. Paul</city><state>MN</state><postal>55101-1805</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651.602.1561</cntvoice><cntemail>jonathan.hoekenga@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></distrib></distinfo><metainfo><metd>20130828</metd><metstdn>Minnesota Geographic Metadata Guidelines</metstdn><metstdv>1.2</metstdv><metextns><onlink>http://www.gis.state.mn.us/stds/metadata.htm</onlink></metextns><metc><cntinfo><cntperp><cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg><cntper>Jon Hoekenga</cntper></cntperp><cntpos>GIS System Administrator</cntpos><cntaddr><address>390 Robert Street North</address><city>St. Paul</city><state>MN</state><postal>55101-1805</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651.602.1561</cntvoice><cntemail>jonathan.hoekenga@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></metc></metainfo><Esri><ModDate>20110729</ModDate><ModTime>15004800</ModTime></Esri><mdDateSt Sync="TRUE">20110729</mdDateSt></metadata>
